@roblox/global/owner.documentation: A reference of [Player](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Player) running the script.

@roblox/global/print.documentation:
Prints into the script builder output instead of the Roblox one.

If the format printing setting is enabled then it will format the message with [repr](https://github.com/Ozzypig/repr).

@roblox/global/warn.documentation:
Warns into the script builder output instead of the Roblox one.

If the format printing setting is enabled then it will format the message with [repr](https://github.com/Ozzypig/repr).

@roblox/global/error.documentation:
Throws an error, if the format printing setting is enabled then it will format the message with [repr](https://github.com/Ozzypig/repr).

Script errors are automatically caught by the script builder and outputted into your output.

@roblox/global/printf.documentation: Prints into the script builder output with richtext enabled, ignoring the format printing setting.

@roblox/global/warnf.documentation: Warns into the script builder output with richtext enabled, ignoring the format printing setting.

@roblox/global/LoadLibrary.documentation:
A reimplementation of removed Roblox's [LoadLibrary](https://devforum.roblox.com/t/loadlibrary-is-going-to-be-removed-on-february-3rd/382516) feature.

This includes `RbxGui`, `RbxStamper`, and `RbxUtility`.

@roblox/global/LoadAssets.documentation: Loads user-made assets into the sandbox. Similar to `require` but only [prohibited instances](https://docs.lua-sandbox.ewdev.net/script-api/script/functions#blocked-instances) are allowed.

@roblox/global/LoadAssets/param/0.documentation: The asset to load. `MainModule` must be [this](https://create.roblox.com/store/asset/17767723528).

@roblox/global/NewScript.documentation: Creates and returns a new [Script](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Script) with the specified source under the specified parent, with optional run arguments.

@roblox/global/NS.documentation:
Creates and returns a new [Script](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Script) with the specified source under the specified parent, with optional run arguments.

Alias for `NewScript`

@roblox/global/NewScript/param/1.documentation: The script to be parented on. Defaults to [`workspace`](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Workspace) if no parent is specified.

@roblox/global/NewScript/param/2.documentation: Argument(s) that will be passed on the source by variadic operator (...).

@roblox/global/NewScript/return/0.documentation: The containtment of the ran code.

@roblox/global/NewLocalScript.documentation: Creates and returns a new [LocalScript](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/LocalScript) with the specified source under the specified parent, with optional run arguments.

@roblox/global/NLS.documentation:
Creates and returns a new [LocalScript](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/LocalScript) with the specified source under the specified parent, with optional run arguments.

Alias for `NewLocalScript`

@roblox/global/NewLocalScript/param/1.documentation: The script to be parented on. Defaults to [owner](https://docs.lua-sandbox.ewdev.net/script-api/script/variables#owner)'s [`PlayerGui`](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/PlayerGui) if no parent is specified.

@roblox/global/NewLocalScript/param/2.documentation: Argument(s) that will be passed on the source by variadic operator (...).

@roblox/global/NewLocalScript/return/0.documentation: The containtment of the ran code.
